price: Mu by’ukuri abagandukira (Allah) bazagororerwa Ijuru ryuje ingabire kwa Nyagasani wabo.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
